data.name: Rob Riches
data.detailed_description:
“You are Rob Riches. Solve the temple mystery!”

GATHER ALL THE COINS!



Your quest? To gather all the coins of course! Solve the puzzle to get each shiny coin, and unlock the path forward.

WATCH YOUR STEP!



Some tiles might just fall down, and seal your fate. Make sure you plan ahead in these dangerous temples. In Rob Riches, each step may be your last!

OUT OF MY WAY!



What are all these stones doing here? Some stones can be moved out of the way, use them to protect you or place them on a pressure plate to open a path forward.

IT'S A TRAP!



Be careful! Each temple has its own set of traps and dangers you must overcome.

TEST YOUR WIT!



As you delve further, the challenges become progressively more difficult to truly test your puzzle solving skills!

CLAIM YOUR PRIZE!



Surpass the dangers to claim each world's great treasure - they belong in a museum!

FEATURES

  • Nearly 100 unique, handcrafted levels.
  • Made a horrible mistake? No worries, use the undo button!
  • Turn-based traps and mechanics in Sokoban style puzzles.
  • Beat the devs and improve your best solutions with the step counter.
  • Three distinct worlds with environmental hazards like ice, falling rocks and of course: flamethrowers!
  • Can you find the ultra secret red coins?
  • Jump right into puzzle solving! No long cutscenes or tedious tutorials needed.
  • Levels get progressively more difficult as you progress through the worlds.
  • Play a game about robbing riches as a character named Rob Riches in a game called Rob Riches.

data.short_description: Plan your steps carefully as you traverse ancient temples, filled with dangerous traps and puzzles.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Portuguese, Vietnamese
data.reviews:
“Rob Riches is a daring adventure with bite-sized chunks and a charming protagonist. While the goal of the game is simple, getting to it is anything but - and the wide variety of puzzles to solve in small, casual bursts is definitely well worth the price tag.”
Pocket Gamer

“Rob Riches is a great package. Its straightforward puzzling is made to be about as convenient and welcoming as possible, making it a worthwhile pickup for anyone regardless of your level of experience with these kinds of games.”
4/5 – 148Apps

“For those of us who like Sokoban style puzzles, you will find everything you are looking for in Rob Riches. Reasonably priced and a pretty challenging game in the later levels. The game ran fine on my laptop and the controls work as they should. Rob Riches is a solid and enjoyable puzzle game that gets my vote.”
Ladies Gamers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHZ, 2 cores
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 620
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHZ, 4 cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 920M and newer cards
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
